newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Quoted thinly at steady levels.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Quoted thinly at steady levels.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted thinly at mostly steady levels in bids and offers on Friday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session.
No barges traded versus none on Thursday.
- 10 barges, St Paul-Savage, upper Mississippi River, bid 135 percent of tariff, unchanged from May 16, no offer.
- Eight barges, St Paul-Savage, upper Mississippi River, two each week of July, bid 135 percent, no comparison, no offer.
- Four barges, Memphis through Cairo, Mississippi River, one each week of September, bid 135 percent, down five percentage points from May 20, no offer.
